segments.text: Hello . Do you like this jewelry ? I made most of these items myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You really have talent . How did you learn to do this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My mother taught me some tricks of the trade . I've always loved jewelry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . But I could never make bracelets like these .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been making these designs for over ten years . You can have a bracelet for ten dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take one right now for seven dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
